quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Nearly always when actors are approached by the beauticians, they try to avoid the dabs that the beauticians put on their faces. They dodge them.
A thing of beauty is a joy forever: its loveliness increases; it will never pass into nothingness.
A smile is the best makeup any girl can wear.
The most beautiful makeup of a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy.
Inner beauty is great, but a little mascara never hurts.
Time may be a great healer, but it's also a lousy beautician.

There are no better cosmetics than a severe temperance and purity, modesty and humility, a gracious temper and calmness of spirit; and there is no true beauty without the signatures of these graces in the very countenance.
Wearing cosmetics that were tested on animals makes you ugly on the inside
Cosmetics is a boon to every woman, but a girl's best beauty aid is still a near-sighted man.
Like a therapist hairdressers are in a position of trust. We are transforming not just how a person looks but how they feel.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
Tears can ruin the handiwork of the best beautician.
Beauty follows a bell curve, meaning there are a small number of exceptionally beautiful people, and a small number of exceptionally unattractive people.
Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
It is said that no star is a heroine to her makeup artist.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
The cosmetics industry has much to answer for. It's a multi-million- pound confidence trick based on giving women endless hope, courtesy of overpriced little pots.
In the factory we make cosmetics; in the drugstore we sell hope.
The best thing is to look natural, but it takes makeup to look natural.
The beauty myth is always actually prescribing behaviour and not appearance.
For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
Sometimes a good feeling from inside is worth much more than a beautician.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
Whether you are sixteen or over sixty, remember, understatement is the rule of a fine makeup artist.
If you are talking about beauty, books are cheaper than cosmetics.
Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
Cosmetics is the science of a woman's cosmos.
